name: Contemplate (Part 1)
description:
You're the CORE, produced to repair someone's soul.

But it's already too damaged to fix, so why even try?

------------------------

This game was made as an entry for Global Game Jam 2020. 

Credits to Robert Hart of Music In Minutes (musicinminutes.com) for the music used in the game. Any other music was from Zapsplat (Zapsplat.com)
